item.title: Liberty & Other Stories
item.description: I did not think I could love the [[series/prosperityverse|Prosperityverse]] more, BUT I DO.

item.title: Home Remedies
item.description: A collection of short stories, of which my favorite (of course it is, since diving is my favorite sport of the summer Olympics) is the pair of Olympic-level divers, trained to be each other’s shadow, one in unrequited love with the other.

item.title: Ninetails
item.description: I love mythology turned feminist, but something about this was so on the nose that it didn’t quite pull me in.

item.title: On the Fox Roads
item.description: Nghi Vo can write [[books/the chosen and the beautiful|queer Jazz Age fanfic]] for me all day any day. (Also excellent: the Venn diagram of her Chinese and Vietnamese characters, the overlapping similarities and the differences.
